headings.usage: Use for all section titles, hero text, and card headings. Tracking tight (-0.02em).

body.usage: Use for paragraphs, labels, and UI text. High legibility.

monospaced.usage: Use for data values (IDs, specific metrics) or 'technical' labels.

primary.description: Forest Green - Represents health, nature, growth.

secondary.description: Sunset Orange - Represents play, energy, training alerts.

accent.description: Soft Grey/Mist - For backgrounds to reduce eye strain.

dashboard_grid.description: Use high density grid for data. Spanning rules: Summary (1x1), Charts (2x2), Feed (1x2).

landing_grid.description: Asymmetrical layout for visual interest. Mix text-heavy blocks with image blocks.

cards.styles: bg-white rounded-2xl border border-gray-100 shadow-card hover:shadow-hover transition-shadow duration-300

inputs.styles: rounded-xl border-gray-200 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 focus:border-primary transition-all

gamification_elements.progress_bars: Use 'h-3 rounded-full bg-gray-100' with 'bg-primary' indicator. Add striped animation for active states.
gamification_elements.badges: Small pill-shaped tags. 'bg-green-100 text-green-700' for success, 'bg-orange-100 text-orange-700' for training levels.
gamification_elements.streaks: Fire icon (Lucide) with count. Animate 'pulse' on update.

icons.usage: Use specifically for navigation and actions. Use Emojis SPARINGLY (only for user content).

accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure all text on 'primary' background is White. Text on 'accent' background must be Gray-900.
accessibility.focus_states: All interactive elements must have 'focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-offset-2 ring-primary'.
accessibility.text_size: Minimum body text size 16px (text-base). Labels can be 14px (text-sm).

motion.page_transition: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -10 }} transition={{ duration: 0.3 }}

instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Outfit' font from Google Fonts for headings (import in index.css).
Use 'DM Sans' font from Google Fonts for body (import in index.css).
Implement the 'Bento Grid' for the Dashboard page to show 'Daily Tasks', 'Health Status', 'Training Progress' simultaneously.
Use the provided image URLs for specific sections. 'Hero Main' for Landing Page, 'Activity Play' for Games section.
Do NOT use gradients for text. Keep text solid for readability.
Ensure the 'Travel Checklist' uses checkbox components with strikethrough animation on completion.
Health records should look like a medical timeline (clean, vertical line, dates on left).
Training modules should use a 'Level' card system (Beginner -> Advanced) with progress bars.
Update tailwind.config.js to include the custom colors (Forest Green, Sunset Orange).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. Avoid this.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts. Use grids.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors separates good from extraordinary.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable.
